== Main Inclusion Report for python-cups ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/p/python-cups, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Library component required by system-config-printer, the proposed Xubuntu Edgy printer manager GUI
** Developed for Fedora Core 6
 0. ''Security:''
** It is fresh code, no known security issues
** Source code review: 
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions.
** Actively maintained by upstream author (Tim Waugh, RedHat printing person)
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.debian.org/doc/packaging-manuals/python-policy/|Debian Python Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard cdbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
